content: Are there any examples of tapered medication dosages? e.g take 2 pills each day this week, and 1 pill each day next week and then regiment is completed
Yes, there are lots of examples of dosages in the MedicationRequest and MedicationDispense resources.
i think i found it! the timeline is implied by the dosage sequence. thanks! https://www.hl7.org/fhir/medicationdispense0319.json.html
